briefTitle: Cohort Study to Assess the Level of Compliance in Undertaking Breast Self Examination Among Women Attending Preventive Oncology Clinic
officialTitle: A Short Duration Pilot Cohort Study to Assess the Level of Compliance in Undertaking Breast Self Examination (BSE) Among Women Attending Preventive Oncology Clinic
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women attending Preventive Oncology Clinic during the month of November-December 2010.
* Women undertaking BSE training.
* Residential address mentioned as Mumbai.
* Contact number available.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women residing outside Mumbai, Maharashtra.
